forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then clearing with ample sunshine by the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
